attributes.title: Would not recommend
attributes.review: This application is very hard to read, glitches constantly and is overall an unpleasant experience on my i phone. not only is the app itself a waste of i cloud space, but the messages behind the administration support white supremacy, racist, homophobic, and downright inhuman ideation. disgusting.

attributes.title: Awful!
attributes.review: When I went to download the app it wouldn’t work. It kept glitching until my phone shut down completely. When I was finally able to get my phone back on, my lockscreen and homescreen had been changed to Trumps face! Worst app ever, would not recommended

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: this app completely crashed my phone 😤 at first it took a whole week to download and then once it FINALLY downloaded, i opened the app and my phone just turned off😳🤔 i took it to the apple store but they said there was nothing to do to fix it😓😒i had to but a new EXPENSIVE phone bc of this app😡🤬 DO NOT DOWNLOAD😠🤯🥱🤮🤢

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWLOAD
attributes.review: this app took 128 weeks to dowload and after it did it just kept getting worse. everytime i opened the app to see my non, racist non homophobic, amazing president donald j trump, i would get death threats before my phone completky shut down. this app wiped my phone of all of my data. do not download this app under any circumstances.

attributes.title: WARNING!! DO NOT GET THIS APP‼️
attributes.review: Never in my life have I had a worse experience with an app. It posted ALL of my information onto my Facebook page for the whole world to see! It deleted more than half of my photos and videos and it sent my noodz to my mom!! Do not download this app it will ruin everything! ‼️

I downloaded this app today to start supporting our amazing President. I am BAFFLED by how awful the app works. It immediately deleted all the photos on my phone and cleared all my date; disgusting. It then started cussing me out and telling me that I as a queer person HAVE to vote for Trump in the fall, this is insanity. I do NOT 🙅‍♀️🙅‍♀️ recommend this app. 😡

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: So once I downloaded this app I heard about them trying to shut down tiktok which Trump is trying to shut down a lot of things but tiktok keeps parents and kids entertained and keeps them happy and why would you want to shut it down if it makes kids happy🤡

attributes.title: IT HACKS AND RUINS YOUR PHONE😔😡😤
attributes.review: So I wanted to vote for our tOtallY gOod PrEsiDent and see what was going on but then as soon as I download the app all my photos are gone and my wall paper was turned into trump 😤😡 then the app took all of my information and storage and is now currently selling it on the dark web 1 STAR TERRIBLE APP DONT DOWNLOAD (do download and rate it one star though😳🤭🤗🤩🥳🤪😚) IM GONNA SUE😔😣😢🤬😭😟😡😤😠

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to try to connect to the orange man but as soon as I entered the app, Trumps nudes started to show up 🤢. The app caused my phone screen to crack and it deleted all of my apps. I would definitely never recommend getting this app unless you want to ruin your whole phone and see a baby carrot.

attributes.title: Do not download this app
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app it shut me out of the app and blew up my phone, I am writing this from my other phone that has not blown up. When I did try to download on this phone it wiped my data clean and had to backup my phone. I highly suggest to not download this app.
